name: The Wayhaven Chronicles: Book Three
storyline:
Mad-scientist vampires, supernatural carnivals! Can there be anything else?

Well…

As you settle into your new life working with Unit Bravo—and growing ever closer to one member in particular—life goes on. But so does the supernatural world.

A string of kidnappings takes over Wayhaven, and once more, you're called in to help when it quickly becomes apparent there's more happening than what's on the surface.

Even worse when the kidnapper's focus turns towards you—and you are the only one who has the power to deal with them.

It's time for bids to be placed.

But when the gavel drops…better make sure it's not you who's the next lot.
summary: Your decisions will shape who is friend or foe, who will share in your secrets, and just how your romance with a certain vampire will grow!
